name: Tile Map Accelerator - Isometric Demo V2
name_original: Tile Map Accelerator - Isometric Demo V2
description:
Tile Map Accelerator Isometric Demo

  • Mouse scroll or + - keys to control camera zoom.
  • RMB and drag to move camera.
  • LMB to select a tile.
  • F key to switch tile selector render layer
  • G key to generate a new map
